name: Envoie sur quel tab on est
Affichage de la carte et des \n positions des lampadaires
Permet la synchronisation des lampadaires \n √† l'√©chelle de tout le r√©seau
query
dbToJsonForReport
func:
let gradOutput = []
let lumOutput = []
let tempOutput = []
let humOutput = []
let enOutput = []
let failOutput = []

let input = msg.payload

for(let i=0;i<input.length;i++){//nbr de timestamps
    let T = input[i]["time"]
    gradOutput.push({"x":T,"y":input[i]["li"]})
    lumOutput.push({"x":T,"y":input[i]["lii"]})
    tempOutput.push({"x":T,"y":input[i]["t"]})
    humOutput.push({"x":T,"y":input[i]["hum"]})
    enOutput.push({"x":T,"y":input[i]["pow"]})
    failOutput.push({"x":T,"y":input[i]["lb"]})
}
return [{payload:[{"series":[""],"data":[gradOutput],"labels":[""]}]},
        {payload:[{"series":[""],"data":[lumOutput],"labels":[""]}]},
        {payload:[{"series":[""],"data":[tempOutput],"labels":[""]}]},
        {payload:[{"series":[""],"data":[humOutput],"labels":[""]}]},
        {payload:[{"series":[""],"data":[enOutput],"labels":[""]}]},
        {payload:[{"series":[""],"data":[failOutput],"labels":[""]}]}
        ];

topic: CREATE TABLE Data (     esp32_GID INTEGER NOT NULL,     esp32_ID INTEGER NOT NULL,  	/* YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm */     time TEXT NOT NULL,  	time_led_on_ms INTEGER NOT NULL, 	led_broken INTEGER NOT NULL, 	led_intensity REAL NOT NULL, 	power_Wh REAL NOT NULL,  	light_intensity REAL NOT NULL, 	temp REAL NOT NULL, 	humidity REAL NOT NULL );  CREATE UNIQUE INDEX Data_UNIQUE ON Data (esp32_GID, esp32_ID, time);
